column2: "<%me>, where are you at currently? Oh wonderful, it sounds like you are in the Gate Area."
"Do you recall about all the facilities you have access to there? If not we can run through a quick refresher. Plus I would love the practice explaining it!"
"Over here is where ARKS will depart to go on missions or to just explore the different planets."

"This is the Quest Counter where you can find all kinds of different missions and requests. Over there is the Class Counter where you can freely change, enhance, and modify your Classes. Finally, you can visit the Medical Center for a useful pick-me-up before you head out."
"Oh! <%me>, now that you're back, I'm sure a lot of people want to speak with you. You should look around and talk them when you get the chance."
